{
    "style": "A calming abstract isometric/3D illustration of ***very*** subtle translucent glowing elements with neon accents. Elements should be constrained to the right side of the image. ={
    "style": "A calming abstract isometric watermark constrained to the right half of the image\nThe watermark should be ethereal, almost ghostlike (use the provided palette at no more than 10% opacity), comprised of ***very*** subtle translucent glowing polygons or lines with neon accents and specular highlights. \nUse lines and polygons only. No spheres, cylinders, or pyramids. Do not incorporate organic or abstract shapes.\nThe color palette is meant to mimic the 'ironbow' thermal imaging palette (white hot/foreground, orange warm, purple cool/background).\nImage ***must*** be delivered in the format, and aspect ratio specified. parameters.prompt:
=# CROP IMAGE
## Source Image
{{ $json.webViewLink }}

## FORMAT
Center and crop source image to {{ $('set').first().json.aspectRatio }} with no letterboxing.
